title: Save on holiday travel by joining Dollar Flight Club Premium Plus for only $79.97
content:
Macworld

If you’re like most of us, you’re already sizing up the cost of airline tickets for all that holiday travel coming up. Rather than angrily paying the extortion-style rates some airlines charge, joining Dollar Flight Club (DFC) could be the much-needed answer to avoid getting gouged this holiday season. Now, you can get yourself or a loved one a DFC Premium lifetime subscription for only $39.97 or a Premium Plus+ for only $79.97.

Dollar Flight Club is like having your own personal travel agent who scours the web 24/7 for affordable flights. Simply insert your home airport, select some of your premier travel destinations, and then DFC does the rest. Just book your vacation once DFC finds your ideal flight and price!

Premium and Premium Plus+ memberships net users access to all domestic deals, international deals, and Mistake Fares from their home airports. In addition, users will get up to 50% discounts on discount on products, services, and experiences for their travels, including Huckberry, Babbel, Acanela Expeditions, and more. 

The difference between the two subscriptions is that Premium Plus+ members get access to business and first-class flight deals, as well as economy. They’ll also receive an extra 20% discount on Mobile Passport Plus. No wonder Condé Nast raved, “Dollar Flight Club has an impressive track record hunting down low-priced seats.”

Give yourself or a loved one the gift of affordable travel this holiday season and beyond.

This exclusive pricing is only available until October 31st at 11:59pm Pacific. Get:

  • A Dollar Flight Club Premium Lifetime Subscription for just $39.97.
  • A Dollar Flight Club Premium Plus+ Lifetime Subscription for just $79.97.

 

Dollar Flight Club Premium Lifetime Subscription

Starting at just $39.97 at Macworld

Prices subject to change.
